name: Birthday Special
title: Celebrate Your Birthday with Us!
body: Mark your calendars! Eat Le Mou is turning up the flavor with a special birthday bash menu packed with delectable treats.
We're offering special discounts on these customer favorites.
Herbal Silkie Chicken Soup: Warm your soul with this nourishing and flavorful soup, now at a discounted price of RM79.20 (usual price RM88.00).
Pineapple Fried Rice: Savor the vibrant flavors of this classic stir-fry, available at a special price for just RM61.20 (usual price RM68.00).
Cantonese Steamed Fish: Experience the delicate taste of perfectly steamed fish, for only RM34.20 (usual price RM36.00).
footer: Make your birthday extra special with these tempting treats! Available at your nearest Eat Le Mou restaurant.

name: Morning Special
title: Start Your Day with Delicious Morning Special!
body: Enjoy a satisfying and delicious breakfast at Eat Le Mou with our special Morning Set menu! This limited-time offer is available from 9:00am to 11:00am (Mon - Fri) only.
Our Morning Special allows you to create your ideal breakfast combination.
Vegan Congee:A light and healthy option packed with flavor.
Chicken Congee:A comforting and savory classic.
Plus Your Choice with Two Delicious Sides
Lotus Root Soup:A delightful addition to your meal.
Gui Ling Gao:A traditional Chinese brown sugar cake for a touch of sweetness.
footer: Don't miss out on this fantastic way to start your day. Come on down to Eat Le Mou and experience the taste of a perfect morning!
